control_attributes.control_description: The organization retains [Assignment: organization-defined previous versions of baseline configurations of the information system] to support rollback.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization analyzes changes to the information system in a separate test environment before implementation in an operational environment, looking for security impacts due to flaws, weaknesses, incompatibility, or intentional malice.

Control Statement: The organization retains [Assignment: organization-defined previous versions of baseline configurations of the information system] to support rollback.
